isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 2000 SERIES GRILLE

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Grille (Original Hood) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND WASHER ASSEMBLY (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: With the hood in the closed position.
Remove 8 hex bolt and washer assemblies (Item 1), 2 each side and 2 each at the top and bottom of the grille trim (Item 2) securing it to the hood assembly (Item 3).
Remove the grille trim (Item 2) from the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Grille (Original Hood) - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the hood in the closed position.
Position the grille trim (Item 2) on the hood assembly (Item 3).
Loosely install the 8 hex bolt and washer assemblies (Item 1), 2 each side and 2 each at the top and bottom holding the grille trim (Item 2) to the hood assembly (Item 3).
Tighten all the hex bolts (Item 1) into the riv nuts (Item 4) securing the grille trim (Item 2) to the hood assembly (Item 3). Tighten to 40 to 60 in-lbs. (4.5 to 7 Nm).

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Stationary Grille (Original Hood), Grille Trim - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND WASHER ASSEMBLY (1/4-20 UNC)
6. HEX BOLT AND WASHER ASSEMBLY (1/4-20 UNC)
7. FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT (1/4-20 UNC)
15. STATIONARY GRILLE BAR CENTER MOUNTING BRACKET
16. STATIONARY GRILLE BAR UPPER MOUNTING BRACKET
17. STATIONARY GRILLE BAR LOWER MOUNTING BRACKET

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.

Remove 8 hex bolt and washer assemblies (Item 1), 2 each side and 2 each at the top and bottom of each vertical grille bar of the grille trim (Item 2) securing grille trim to the hood assembly (Item 3).
Remove the grille trim (Item 2) from the hood assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Stationary Grille (Original Hood), Grille Trim - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.
Position the grille trim (Item 2) on the hood assembly (Item 3).

Loosely install the 8 hex bolt and washer assemblies (Item 1), 2 each side and 2 each at the top and bottom of each vertical grille bar of the grille trim (Item 2) holding it to the hood assembly (Item 3).
Tighten all the hex bolts (Item 1) into the riv nuts (Item 4) securing the grille trim (Item 2) to the hood assembly (Item 3). Tighten to 40 to 60 in-lbs. (4.5 to 7 Nm).

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Stationary Grille (Original Hood), Vertical Stationary Grille Bar - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Step inside the grille opening (Item 5) and remove hex bolt and washer assemblies (Item 6) and flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 7) at top and bottom of vertical stationary grille bar (Item 8).

Remove the vertical stationary grille bar (Item 8), unless the vehicle is equipped with a stone shield (Item 9). If so equipped, remove mounting hardware in the center of the vertical stationary grille bar as follows.

If the vehicle is equipped with a stone shield (Item 9), remove the pan head machine screw (Item 10) and spacer, flat washer, lockwasher and hex nut (Items 11, 12, 13 and 14) at the center of the vertical stationary grille bar (Item 8) securing it to the stationary grille bar center mounting bracket (Item 15).
Repeat procedure to remove other vertical stationary grille bar and stationary grille bar center mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Stationary Grille (Original Hood), Vertical Stationary Grille Bar - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: If the hood is not in the full open position, release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Step inside the grille opening (Item 5) and position the vertical stationary grille bar (Item 8) on the upper and lower stationary grille bar mounting brackets (Items 16 and 17).

Install the hex bolt and washer assembly (Item 1) through the front of the stationary grille bar (Item 8) and upper stationary grille bar mounting bracket (Item 16). Then install flat washer and hex lock nut (Item 7). Tighten to finger tight.

Install the hex bolt and washer assembly (Item 1) through the front of the stationary grille bar (Item 8) and lower stationary grille bar mounting bracket (Item 17). Then install flat washer and hex lock nut (Item 7). Tighten to finger tight.
Once the stationary grille bar (Item 8) is in place. Tighten upper and lower hex bolts (Item 1) and hex lock nuts (Item 7). Tighten to 40 to 60 in-lbs. (4.5 to 7 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install other vertical stationary grille bar.
If the vehicle is equipped with a stone shield (Item 9), install the stationary grille bar center mounting bracket (Item 15) as follows.

Install pan head machine screw with flat washer (Items 10 and 12) through the front of one stationary grille bar, spacer, flat washer and stone shield (Items 8, 11, 12 and 9). Then position the stationary grille bar center mounting bracket (Item 15) over the pan head machine screw and install lockwasher and hex nut (Items 13 and 14). Tighten to finger tight.
Repeat procedure to install stationary grille bar center mounting bracket at other stationary grille bar.
Once the stationary grille bar center mounting bracket (Item 15) is in place. Tighten the 2 pan head machine screws (Item 10) and hex nuts (Item 14). Tighten to 40 to 60 in-lbs. (4.5 to 7 Nm).

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Grille (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996), Upper Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. PAN HEAD SCREW AND FLAT WASHER

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.

Remove 9 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1), 3 each in the right, center and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2), securing the upper grille (Item 3) to the grille mounting brackets of the hood assembly (Item 4).
Remove the upper grille (Item 3) from the hood assembly (Item 4).

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Grille (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996), Upper Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.
Position the upper grille (Item 3) on the hood assembly (Item 4).

Install the 9 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1), 3 each in the right, center and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2), securing the upper grille (Item 3) to the grille mounting brackets of the hood assembly (Item 4).

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Grille (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996), Lower Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. PAN HEAD SCREW AND FLAT WASHER
2. RIGHT AND LEFT GRILLE MOUNTING BRACKET

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.

Remove 5 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1), 2 each in the right and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2) and 1 in the center grille mounting bracket (Item 3), securing the lower grille (Item 4) to the grille mounting brackets of the hood assembly (Item 5).
Remove the lower grille (Item 4) from the hood assembly (Item 5).

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Grille (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996), Lower Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.
Position the lower grille (Item 4) on the hood assembly (Item 5).

Install the 5 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1), 2 each in the right and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2) and 1 in the center grille mounting bracket (Item 3), securing the lower grille (Item 4) to the grille mounting brackets of the hood assembly (Item 5).
